title: Ancient Persia
brief_description: Magnificent ruins now reveal the history of the great Empire of Cyprus and Darius, the splendid palaces of Persepolis, great roads, and gold coinage. Famous sites like Marathan, Hellespont, Thermopylae, and the Bay of Salamis, indicate the shift of power to the Greeks, and the end of the Persian domination.
